Aesthetic Design- Stylish rectangle shape with linear wire design, round edging along top rim prevents scratches. Smooth metal streamlines and rounded angles design protect your desktop from scratch. Stackable capabilities increase and utilize vertically-stored space to maximize your desktop workspace.
Stackable File Tray- Stackable design allows you to stack them together or put them to different places separately. 4 tier trays satisfy your need of sorting files, no worry about cluttered desktop anymore.
Durable and Sturdy Construction – Durable material and Electroplating technique give it a sturdy metal construction and smooth shiny metal outlook. Electroplating surface has the advantages of anti-oxidation, anti-corrosion, anti-rust, anti-wear, can effectively extend the service life.
Perfect Gift Choice- This Rose Gold Letter Tray is the most beautiful gift you could possibly give to anyone. Perfect gift for colleagues, teachers, friends. Elegant rose gold look lights up the personal home office space instantly, girls would love it.

About Bonsaii：

Continuously developing high quality products to earn your satisfaction. To provide you with a more convenient, efficient and easy to use product.

Reliable Warehouse Transport

Through the efficient management of our warehouse, we want to deliver every item to you in a perfect and timely manner.

【Crosscut Paper & Credit Card Shredder】Bonsaii home paper shredder, shreds up to 6 sheets of paper at one time (Max 36 Sheets in one minutes) into tiny pieces measuring 13/64 x 1-37/64 inches (5x40mm), also destroys junk mail/document/staples/credit cards as well.
【Compact Sizes】The home shredder comes with portable handle design and small size of 14.1 x 11.8 x 7 inches, you can place it in the coner or under the desk. Perfect for home or small office.
【Easy Operation & Safe Protection】Auto start/stop and manual-reverse function protect the paper shredder from the frustration of paper jams. Overheat protection function tackle the trouble in using the shredder and prolong its lifetime. The document shredder will stop working once you lift the head, keeping you safe.
【3.4 Gal Transparent Wastebasket】The crosscut shredder with 3.4 gallon wastebasket can hold 180 sheets of A4 paper for less frequent and easy emptying. Large transparent window makes it easy to see when it is full.
【1 Year Warranty & Professional Service】Bonsaii provides 1-Year warranty for our products. If you meet any questions during use, please feel free to contact us, we have professional customer service to help you within 24hrs.

  • Shreds up to 6 sheets at a time
  • Overheating protection
  • 3.4 Gallons transparent window bin.
  • Portable handle for lift
  • 7×24 hour online service
  • 1 Year limited Protection

Home office shredder has the Anti-Jam and overheated protection function, it is a good helper for your life.

Cross-cut Shredder perfectly protects your privacy (security level P-3), helps you minimize information leakage.

Read more

Overheat Protection Function

If shredder runs continuously for more than 3 mins, may overheat. Please shut down the machine and cool it for 40 mins to recover.

Auto Star and Manual Reverse

Once detects papers, it will start to auto shred. when shred papers more than max capacity, you can use Rev mode to clean jam.

High-Security P-3 Level

This shredder can easily crush paper, staples, paper clips, can also destroy ATM receipts, credit cards, Except old newspapers.

Product Description

Beiz Gold Desk Organizer with Sliding Drawer, 1 Tray and 5 Vertical Slot Sorters

Enjoy clean and exquisite life to the fullest with Beiz, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities

Do you want a multi-function desk organizer that can store, clean and tidy desktop?Do you want your work area to be a pleasant place that reflects your bright and glamorous personality？Do you want to change your desktop from a boring space to a fashionable display area?

Beiz gold desk organizer can give you all you need

Specifications:

Color: Gold

Material: Metal

Dimensions: 12.6″L x 9.1″W x 11.8″H

Compartments : 5 upright sections and 1 tray with a 3 sections drawer

Shipping Weight: 1.1 LBS

Package: 1 x Gold workspace organizer

Beiz Desk Organizer Keeps Your Desk Organized

Creating extra storage space virtually anywhere by allowing you to add storage vertically

Gold-colored office accessories are just the thing to elevate your workspace and give it the feeling of an executive office. At the same time, it also cleans your desktop and improves efficiency

Adding a touch of gold to even mundane objects like your office supplies makes them feel a little more glamorous boosts warmth and elegance. We’re here with the perfect gold office supplies to make your office feel a little more luxurious

Trendy Gold color design Metal construction and meshes material, durable and simple Easy to assemble with no tools required Easy-slide drawers Powder-coated metal to prevent rust and scratches

【3 in 1 Pefect Combination】Compared with the simplicity of ordinary file organizer or desk organizer, the mesh desktop file organizer has vertical and horizontal storage space – 5 vertical sorters and 1 side load letter tray, and a 3 compartments drawer(can be used independently)
【Durable Material】 The gold desktop file organizer is made of strong mesh metal with a smooth, durable, and rust-resistant ABS coating. It has rounded edges so that picking up items won’t hurt your hands
【Easy to Install】 The gold office organizer is easy to put together, and you can do it in seconds without any tools or screws. The user manual will show you how to do it. It also has 4 soft pads on the bottom to keep the desk from getting scratched
【Considerate Customer Satisfaction】The patent number is D935,524. Beiz provides professional customer service before and after purchase. We’ll do our best to take care of your needs and questions. What you can get a high-quality gold desktop organizer and friendly customer service

Product Description

Sinboun is a U.S. brand which aims to provide efficient and functional work or home office storage. A brand who prides ourselves on the high level of customer care that we offer.

Sinboun organizer is committed to creating a functional, comfortable and efficient office or home storage solution for you.

Sinboun Desktop File Organizer

With a contemporary and elegant design this tray organizer will enhance your workspace and complements any decoration. Sinboun file organizer is a desk organizer accessory for your office or home, this desk organizer keep your home and desk neat and tidy.

Made of Strong Black Metal Mesh Ideal for the Office or Home Creative & Versatile Letter Tray With Handle Classical Look and large Capacity Easy to Install & Instruction Manual Included Round Surface Edges – No Sharp Corners

Multi-purpose Tray Organizer for Your Office or Home

Sturdy design to store any A4or letter size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more. A great start to re-organise your current files and endless paperwork, use our desk organizer to increase your efficiency at work.

Paper sorting and storage rack has plenty of room for your documents and folders and is crafted out of metal, to hold more weight.The top platform, keep your documents and stationery in order.

If you want an office file organizer that blends in with any decoration, this 5 tier letter tray organizer is perfect for you. Sturdy design to store any letter or A4 size files, documents, folders, papers, stationery, mail, magazines, books and more.

(as of Nov 29,2022 01:03:36 UTC – Details)


An Amazon Brand.
Cross cut shredder turns paper into small pieces (0.2 x 1.9 inches; 5 x 47 mm); meets security level P-3 standards
Shreds up to 8 sheets of 20-pound bond paper at a time, including staples and small paper clips; 8.7-inch-wide entry
Destroys credit cards one at a time, through the dedicated slot
4 mode control switch (auto/on, off, reverse, forward) and LED status indicators for power on and overheat
3 minute runtime; 30 minute cool down; if runs beyond max run time, it automatically shuts off to prevent overheating
Handle for easily lifting up the shredder head when it’s time to empty the 4.1 gallon bin
Quality tested: as part of Amazon Basics quality inspections, we test every shredder before shipping it, which means you may see some paper shreds from the testing

Amazon Basics Cross-Cut Paper & Credit Card Shredders

Cross-Cut Shredder

More secure than a strip-cut shredder, this cross-cut shredder slices diagonally in both directions to destroy paper, credit cards and more.

Easy Start

In Auto (on) mode, shredding begins once the machine detects something to be shredded, and then it stops automatically when shredding is complete.

Reverse Function

The reverse function makes it possible to retrieve un-shredded or partially shredded documents, plus helps prevent paper jams.

Thermal Protection for Safety

The shredder will automatically shut off to protect the motor if it runs beyond its maximum run time or begins to over-heat.
